title: Star guardian event start date?
body:
Seriously, 8th of september in Australia or US? You couldn't be any less specific. this is why we release the event with the patch. All delaying does is confuse.

Stop it riot.

replies.body: Referring to the announcement of the Star Guardian event in the [patch 7.17 notes](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-717-notes#patch-upcoming-events), it does explicitly state "8/9/17 at 4:00AM AEST".
